content.title: CREATE A NEW USER ACCOUNT
content.text:
To create a new user account:
1.) Fill in the required fields in the form.
2.) Click next to proceed to step 2.
3.) Select the appropriate role(s) and click the "Finish" button.

content.title: SECURITY REQUIREMENTS
content.text:
1.) Password must be at least seven (7) characters long.
2.) Password must have at least one (1) non-alphanumeric character.
3.) Passwords are NOT case sensitive.

content.title: OTHER
content.text:
1.) Application checks for and prevents duplicate user names.
2.) Application checks for and prevents duplicate user emails.
